snippet: Sebastian Giovinco scored in the 76th minute, and Toronto F.C. tied New York City F.C., 2-2, on Sunday in the first game of the season at Yankee Stadium.
abstract: Toronto FC and New York City FC tie, 2-2; other soccer news noted.
